name: Portal.1
description:
Photograph dated from 2018, I often do nature walks, it's really peaceful and reinvigorating for the body and the mind. Not only can we find formations portal-ish, but nature itself can be a portal (to another world, to our innerself).  

One take I have from this type of experience: we are nature itself, that's a fact; but we have to be careful to not decay in the antropocentric abism... So if you accept one advice: go take a trip into nature, don't let you become a victim of the ecological (and botanical) blindeness that is contaminating a good part of our society. And you just need one plant, one animal, fungus, to go on this trip - and I'm sure that's at least one of them right next to you :) there's none excuses.
 
✹ Find you a good beautiful portal and find love ✹

I'm a brazilian artist, you can find me on twitter by @ocvvvlta.
